articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: NASA astronaut Kate Rubins and Russian cosmonauts are returning to Earth - CNN
articles.description: Russian cosmonauts Sergey Ryzhikov and Sergey Kud-Sverchkov and NASA astronaut Kate Rubins are set to end their 185-day mission on the space station Friday and return to Earth in the early morning hours Saturday.
